meanings.definition: Clintonias: a genus of perennial herbs in the lily family, native to North America.
meanings.sent1: The clintonias in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I learned about different types of clintonias in my botany class.
meanings.sent3: The clintonias had a party and invited all the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: The clintonias stood tall like guardians of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the clintonias made the garden come alive.

meanings.definition: Clintonias: the plural form of clintonia, referring to multiple plants in the genus Clintonia.
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of clintonias growing together in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The clintonias added a touch of elegance to the woodland.
meanings.sent3: The clintonias decided to have a race to see who was the fastest plant.
meanings.sent4: The clintonias danced in the breeze, a graceful spectacle.
meanings.sent5: The sweet fragrance of the clintonias filled the air with joy.
